website_summaries.verdict: Retro styling and a long list of features make this the most versatile instant film camera of the bunch.
pros: This fun-to-use camera doesn't just look good, it's also packed with features like double-exposure mode and a self-timer
It's the only model with an adjustable flash, and its battery can be recharged
It can be placed on a tripod

website_summaries.verdict: Instant print camera that has a stylish, retro look. Fun to use at parties.
pros: Fully automatic camera that's very easy to use
Offers some fun special effect features, such as double exposure option
Includes a built-in flash that can help with low light shooting conditions like you may find at a party
cons: No option to store photos digitally
Quality of prints may disappoint some

customer_reviews.title: Fun and awesome
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy using this camera. I've had this camera for 4 months now but didn't use it much during the winter (because of the film's temperature range - winter too cold!). I recently went on a trip to Seattle and tested out the various modes. The colors come out pretty great and there's wonderful clarity on landscape mode. I love the somewhat grungy/vintage look that prints without using any of the modes as well. Super fun and great camera! P.S. When they say don't point the camera at the sun, really don't. I caught the sun in one of my photos and it was a beautiful black circle in the sky. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I bought for our 10 year wedding anniversary trip to Bisbee and it was perfect! I love the different setting options and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a grear lil camera! I bought for our 10 year wedding anniversary trip to Bisbee and it was perfect! I love the different setting options and it takes great photos! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The camera was amazing... while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: The camera was amazing... while it lasted. I purchased this as a birthday gift for my girlfriend and we were able to take 11 photos before we couldn't use the camera anymore. The camera wouldn't turn on and displayed a flashing "E" constantly. After some research, this is a known error with the camera. I tried multiple trouble shooting steps, but nothing worked. Luckily, I was still able to return it and the film (+the film that was wasted in trouble shooting) for a full refund. We're looking for a different polaroid camera that is a little more reliable instead of a guessing game.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher hansen

customer_reviews.title: Beware of view finder
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. True colors, fast developing, small images, oh ya good luck trying to frame an image with the closeup setting on. The view finder is most likely the worst part of this camera. Make sure you alway frame much looser. I burned several images off just to get close to center framing with the closeup setting on. Hey Fuji how about sending me a roll of film for having to eyeball your poor view finder. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Peter W.

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: We received a defective camera. Shot 20 images and all of them are soft (blurry). Contacted Amazon beyond the return policy and they recommend I get in touch with Fuji. Fuji wants me to send the camera in for repair at my cost. Camera is under warranty, but the shipping is out of pocket. Since the product is defective I feel they should pick up that tab.
customer_reviews.author: The  Patsy Family

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with this thing
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I kinda love this thing. Ok so maybe I might love it a little too much. I'm a professional photographer. And as entrenched in the digital world and all the "MUST HAVE IT NOW" moments that go along with digital, it's really nice to shoot something and have a physical, tangible print in your hands. Friends enjoy getting them. And this has been a real hit when I bring it out on dates. So yeah. Do it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Used it for 2 years and its still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the quality. Extremely high quality. Ive had it now for 2 years and its still as good as when I took it out the box. Would recommend to anyone and also a great gift idea. Ive had great memories with it and will continue to make great memories as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Received E error message after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: I had the camera for exactly one week, worked great and took lots of cute shots. On day 7, I tried to turn it on and received the dreaded "E" error message blinking where the film count usually is. I tried all of the recommended fixes, holding down the power switch, putting in a new film pack (another waste of a pack....), charging the battery to full, and looking inside for blocked film. Nothing worked and the lens would not open. I'll be shipping the camera back to Fujifilm, on my dime unfortunately, to see if it if fixable or if they will send a replacement. I will update the review then.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Marie

customer_reviews.title: Classic... mistakes
customer_reviews.text: It lasted a month and then something inside, that was sticky leather that would scratch the films, came out. Now all i get are scratched up pictures and fuzzy lights on the films. I'd take a bunch of pictures first to see if anything inside disassembles before you decide to return it or not. Really disappointed because this was my birthday present from my mom. Would not buy from here again. It was expensive too.
customer_reviews.author: Loisse Vicente

customer_reviews.title: Adorable to look at, not necessarily good results.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a sucker for cute design and I love photography so I figured this was a good fit for me. I have yet to really be happy with the quality of the pictures that I’ve taken. I’ve tried a variety of lighting and settings and mostly I don’t like what I’m getting. The color isn’t quite right and the clarity just isn’t there. I’m disappointed. On the other hand, I have a great looking camera to add to my camera collection LOL.
customer_reviews.author: 2bis2cr8

customer_reviews.title: The camera cannot load the filmpack
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed to be very nice but only after 6 months stopped working while I have barely used it. The camera cannot load any filmpack and the LCD shows E (i guess for error) and gets stuck there. For such a high price for a Polaroid camera, this problem should not happen after a short time. I have googled this issue and seems lots of people have had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amin Jourabloo

customer_reviews.title: Okay...but battery doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the fact that the battery died after just five cartridges of film. And I had to slit open the camera case to change the battery because the lens froze up when the battery died. That's $25 down the drain for the camera case. And nearly $12 down the drain for the film that got ruined.
customer_reviews.author: amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Camera right out the box doesnt work.
customer_reviews.text: This camera was displaying the "E" code upon arrival. I followed the instructions on the insert that came with the camera but nothing worked. I also googled the error and tried some of the various solutions but none of them worked either. I wasted a box of film on this garbage camera. Fuji doesn't seem to have quality standards for their Cameras apparently.
customer_reviews.author: yourtheguy

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your money!
customer_reviews.text: Professional people than me recommend this camera, and after using it for 3 weeks I just happy that I bought it! There are a lot versions for that camera and I won’t suggest any person to buy that one. BUT if you’re looking for instant film camera with freedom to do amazing things in a reasonable price that’s the one!! People reaction to this camera is so amazing, old, young & kids, everyone love that! Amazing way to snap memories!!
customer_reviews.author: Dor Dahari

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE: Instax Cameras Fail. Get a different brand camera.
customer_reviews.text: I just hung up with FujiFilm Customer Service, and they are aware that their Instax cameras fail on a massive scale, but are unwilling to do anything about it. I bought this camera a few years ago, which I loved while it worked. It recently stopped recognizing new film cartridges when they are loaded. I bought a regular Instax Mini for my goddaughter, and same story. Her mom's Instax Mini has the same unexplained failure. That's 3/3. This is clearly a bad faith business.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter’s wedding for guests to use and insert their photos into a guest book, after doing a lot of research on these types of cameras. The viewfinder doesn’t match with the picture produced, the picture develops from a completely different viewpoint than what is seen. I have used it a little at other events and still find it disappointing. I understand the quality is “retro” but for the price of the film and camera, it’s not worth the investment. As an artist, I may experiment with it more and try some B&W film or other subjects, but it will likely be stuck in a drawer instead of used.
customer_reviews.author: whateverland

customer_reviews.title: Charger sent is not compatible
customer_reviews.text: The charger for the batter sent is not compatible with my plug here in the US. There was nothing stated about choosing a certain country compatible option. They sent me a plug that does not fit my outlet, rendering the charger useless and therefore I am not able to use the camera without a charged batter. I had to contact Fujifilm to purchase a whole new battery charger that is compatible with the outlets in the US. This cost an additional $40+
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my son & daughter-in-law because they moved away. I had a party for them. I got a scrapbook and had all their friends take a picture of themselves & then put it in the scrapbook and then write some things for my kids to read. The camera works great. The pics turn out really nice (just don't put your subject in the shade because it will turn out a bit dark). The battery lasted all day (6-7 hours). I did buy an extra battery but didn't need it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Bought as a gift for myself for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought as a gift for myself for my 30th birthday. Easy to use out of the box. Fast prints- good color. I like the options (kid mode/indoor etc). The camera was a huge hit. Every one enjoyed taking pictures as a keepsake of the night. I have it 4 vs 5 stars bc I haven't figured out the view finder - I've taken pictures that should be a whole face and only 1/2 was actually taken. With that said I just need to play with it more. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: danese87

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: After watching some videos and numerous articles I found that this instaprint camera was the one for me. I like it's more robust, classic look. It gives it a feel of a more professional camera with the nostalgic joy of what we all knew back in the day as the "Polaroid." I almost went with a Polaroid but the cost of film sort of drove me away. This camera had taken very good pictures for me so far. I recommend watching a video of someone demonstrating all of the features and modes on the camera so you don't waste your film taking a picture in the wrong mode.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Cool for parties
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why the review prompt tells me to mention face recognition and picture quality and smudge proof - Thanks for attempting to make reviews even more fake, amazon!!! I have no idea what smudge proof quality is- the camera works fine though I don’t use any of the extra feature. Fun for parties of course but skip the expensive prettier one and get the light color cheaper version of this I don’t see a difference in quality at all
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey1893

customer_reviews.title: This little camera packs a TON of power!
customer_reviews.text: This little camera packs a ton of power! There are multiple modes for taking pictures. So far, I have tried out the landscape mode, the “child” or person/portrait mode, the double exposure and the macro mode...which is very handy. There’s also a light sensor, built in which is useful because it adjusts to make the photos lighter/darker. There is actually a “light x2” option which means it goes EVEN brighter. I have been pleased so far with the Instax 90 and am blown away by how smart (and cute!) this modern camera is. It’s also pretty affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Make true memories :)
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! I had the lower end version and fell in love with these. It was a must have. Worth the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Hugo C

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gift to give
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for 6yo daughter. She absolutely loves it. She wishes pictures sizes are bigger. She starts taking pictures and it raises my wife's eyebrows. We had to explain her, this is not like iPhone. Great fun little camera. Picture quality is not that great which is already expected. You do not need manual to set it up. I would suggest to read it before you do. But manual doesn't come in the box. You have to go online. Also should order film cartridges at the same time. Overall well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality, poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for someone, and it was very nice, the picture quality was great however it is fairly pricey considering the build quality is not very good. The black you see on the front of the camera is made up of a thick rubbery-plastic like material however everything else is this very thin a cheap plastic. It works very nice and gets the job done, however if you travel a lot and are always taking this from place to place make sure you dont drop it even from small heights because it is not very durable
customer_reviews.author: Zuleika Polonia

customer_reviews.title: My second Neo 90
customer_reviews.text: I gave my last Neo 90 to a friend and got another for myself. In terms of point and shoot capability with a few manual features that give this camera an advantage over the other Fujifilm line, this camera is the one to get. Images are very clear and this is a robust little unit. Battery life is great too. It's my go-to camera when going out to parties and shlepping with friends. Throw it in a bag. Take pics with friends. Everyone will love you.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Pappas

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT CLASSIC INSTAX!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this classic neo for quite some times now and it is just perfect for every occasion that I can think of! The features alone is a blessing since it enables me to shoot in various conditions from low lighting to bright scene without over or under exposing my subject. The film cover however is something you may need to be conscious of since it feels like it can be undone if bang around for whatever reason. After 500 films...this camera is still going strong. At one point the lens cover won't close but some times after that...it mysteriously went back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Seng

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take pictures for wedding thank you cards. We set the camera up on a timer and took lots of selfies and it worked out great! Since then it has been a fun camera to have around when people are over. We in no way are professional photographers but the small pictures are beautiful and the camera is fun to use. I love the style of it as well. If you're looking for a basic quick print camera- buy a cheaper one. I bought it because of the style and love it.
customer_reviews.author: CMETZ

customer_reviews.title: This version has a self timer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I have the Instac Wide camera which is also great, but very bulky and a pain to carry. The mini is a lot easier to carry when traveling or just out and about. I’ve used it daily and brought it with me over seas and to plenty of local events. Always a huge hit. Just be prepared to spend money on film and others wanting to take their picture and keep those shot. It’s fun though!
customer_reviews.author: HKTacoma

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Instax Mini
customer_reviews.text: Fujifilm Instax Mini was used at our wedding. This was a perfect memory of our guests to share with our joy. At our reception, there was a small photo table which we placed a sign to snap a photo. We included my young niece, Sara to provide instructions to guests to snap a photo, peel back the protective tape and add to our photo album with your name My niece verified guests took a photo. Our wedding was small at a restaurant, so this snap a photo was perfect fun entertainment for our guests. We like the camera so much were ordered one for my niece.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Goss

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought the Instax 90 instead of the Instax 8
customer_reviews.text: Looks so much better than the 8. I'm sure I would have been okay with the 8, but it looks so much like a toy. The 90 also gives you the capability to turn the flash off, which is really nice. The double exposure option is nice as well, but not a necessity. My friend has the 8 and her pictures are really nice but I think the ones taken with the 90 are slightly better because of the settings available.
customer_reviews.author: spenser

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for parties and fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little camera--takes quality images and really fun to have at parties. I keep it around my house when I have company, and everyone likes being able to take a picture home. I wish the wide format camera had the same quality as this one. Lots of functions to play around with as well. A little bit awkward at first, but you get used to it! Buy the film on Amazon--price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: GMaria

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few months, never dropped it or hit it on anything or left it in a car in extreme heat or cold, yet the lense will slide shut if I tilt it up too far, the strip on top where the pictures come out is coming out of the camera. It was cool or a little bit now I’m just disappointed and have a crappy camera. Wish it wasn’t too late to get a replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Great for fun photos on the go!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great quailty and the faux leather feels pretty darn good. It comes with a strap, which was a major plus for me. I was worried it would be bulky but even with film and battery in, it maintains lightweight appeal. The battery is rechargeable via the supplied charger with wall adapter. It has two shutter buttons for portrait and landscape mode. Flash is also an option. Love this little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! Friends of mine have the simpler version of the Fuji Instax and I really liked the photos it produced. I'm into photography and figured I would prefer the camera that can do more with lighting and shutter. Plus I love the look of this camera. It's simple to use and the film is easily available on Amazon. It is a bigger than I thought, but still a fun size. It comes with a strap that attaches right to the camera. I haven't been able to really dive into everything it can do just yet. But so far I love it!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Cool & hip
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this camera. It's unique & super easy to use. The instructions are very clear and easy to follow. It really is a cool purchase & has brought me some joy in these odd times :)
customer_reviews.author: Empty Nest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great instant camera!
customer_reviews.text: I would argue that this is the best instant camera that I have used. I have an Instax Mini, Instax Wide, and a Lomo camera. This camera is the only one that consistently takes solid photos, offers the right amount of adjusting features, and is also definitely the most attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so much fun, but be careful with kids
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun with this camera, that when my 6 year old used it and broke it we bought a new one. Just make sure the kids know how to load the film well. It's great for parties of any kind, I let my son take it to a wedding, and he's sometimes shy but with the camera he enjoys having something to do. we take it on vacation and hang the photos afterwards, we take photo with friends at our home and let them leave with a memento, its nice to have a physical picture like the "old days."
customer_reviews.author: Iwokeuplikedis

customer_reviews.title: I have had so much fun with this little thing
customer_reviews.text: I was originally looking into purchasing an instant camera for my wedding reception, but the more research I did, the more I wanted one for personal use. I have had so much fun with this little thing! I was very torn because I was worried about the mini flim being too small, but did not like how big the cameras for the wide film are. Seriously, they are huge. I have no regrets purchasing this camera. The mini film is the perfect size and this camera has many enjoyable features. If I were to start the research process for one of these again, I would make the same choice over and over. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rylie Miller

customer_reviews.title: scratches extremely easily, film is way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: scratches extremely easily, film is way overpriced, don't even try taking images without direct sunlight, the flash is useless. also, every time you open the back it resets as if there are 10 photos left when there aren't. Also, once, it wouldn't print a picture, opened it & when I shut it, a imageless photo came out- upsetting since Ive taken less than 20 pics- This product doesn't come with any film either. so its going to cost you $30 more just for the film, & half your pics will come out too dark bc of the flash i mentioned earlier.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Instant Gratification
customer_reviews.text: The most fun you will ever have will be with this camera. It's simple to use but takes a learning curve. I'm a professional photographer and use this camera specifically for the double exposure feature. The only downside is there is no light meter or focus ring. The cost of instant film will limit your use and make you think more about getting the right shot before you take it. There's no delete button or storage. Once it prints, that's all you get. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: North Woods

customer_reviews.title: A Decent Camera/Polaroid.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to love it, but I honestly don’t. It’s definitely a decent camera, but it seems it’s best photos are taken outside, not really indoors. I understand that it’s a Polaroid, but the quality of the pictures aren’t as clear/detailed as i would like them to be. I hate to compare it to my iPhone, which is only an SE... but my cell phone takes better pictures than this camera. I bought several films as a way of practice (have a better understanding of the camera). I just don’t think it was worth buying, not for my standards, once again.. it’s a decent camera/Polaroid. Honestly? I give this camera 3.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my birthday this year, to go with my Instax mini 9. I LOVE THIS CAMERA! While my original Instax is cute and funky and works well mostly outdoors, this one has a ton of settings and features without having to be digital. I love the party setting, it really takes great pictures indoors. I love to hang these pictures all around my home, or gift them to people.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a fun way to take pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's portable and it's just a fun item to use. There are problem with contrast in which the background will be completed black and won't capture anything in the background. I will post one of those pictures here. All in all it's okay. Not something to use if your going for great quality.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: A great polaroid camera with a lot of options
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera due to the number of options that it gives you. You have a lot of control over how you want to get your polaroids. My most used modes are the option to have a much brighter flash and double exposure. The brighter flash is great since I have a black german shepherd and a normal flash wouldn't be good enough to capture him. The double exposure is just a bunch of fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Hipster's treasure
customer_reviews.text: Do you need this? Hell no! Do you want this? Hell yes! A touch of retro-style photos in your pocket - this thing makes perfect wallet-size instant pictures. Main issue with this is sharing photos - you probably will Instagram the picture after it exposes anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: the thing I like about this one is that the batteries are rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: I have another version of he instax and the moment I saw this one I knew I just had to have it. Unlike the other instax, the thing I like about this one is that the batteries are rechargeable. It has many more options. It is easy to use and match with a case and it's even better.
customer_reviews.author: NEMELIE

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is well constructed and looks great. It feels good and has an old school vibe about it. If you've never had one of these Mini's before, know that though the camera is standard size, the pictures are definitely not. The film is about the size of a business card, and the picture quality is good. The pictures all have a feel of nostalgia to them, which is pretty neat. Its definitely a cool camera, but not something I would use for anything but close shots
customer_reviews.author: benji34

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to take pictures for a Halloween party. I was a bit concerned with how the quality would be at night, but there was nothing to worry about! The camera is easy to use and prints good quality photos! I left it out on the table for people to use and it lasted the whole night! I didn't have to charge it once and everyone who used it really liked it! I also really like the extra settings on the camera. I would recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby J.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great instant camera! I always wanted a Polaroid camera but the ones that are authentic are out of my price range. I decided to go ahead and give this camera try because it had a lot of positive reviews. It's pretty compact, sturdy and takes pretty good pictures as far as I'm concerned. If you want to get a Polaroid to take pictures of friends and family or just for fun, this camera does the job. I've included a picture I took of my puppy. It's a little overexposed but thats because I had the flash on with the my room lights on.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I am a previous owner of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I am a previous owner of the popular Fujifilm Instax mini 9, a camera I’d wanted since middle school. I’d had it for a few months and while it is great, I just felt silly with the bulky yet adorable camera and felt like I needed something more... mature. Then I found this. It looks amazing. It looks exactly like an older Pentax camera and it is much more portable than the Fujifilm Instax Mini 8/9. It almost feels professional. Not only that, but it offers so many different modes (night, party, dual exposure, you can turn of the flash, etc.), and it even comes with its own strap. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: A fan favorite :)
customer_reviews.text: I own two other Instax cameras (the Michael Kors Mini 70 and the SQ20) as well as a vintage Polaroid camera (The Button). This is by far my favorite of the whole bunch! I get so many compliments on the look of the camera; people are more floored when they see the quality of the pictures! I enjoy the lighting options and shooting modes that this camera offers, which are a marked improvement over my Mini 70. Will be testing with different indoor lighting options once I get my LED ring light. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Markeysha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an anniversary gift for my bf and I. We like to use it to document any of our dates and important events. It has a sense of nostalgia to it. The picture quality is ok, a little grainy. It is very reminiscent of the old polaroids we had in the 90s. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannel M.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about a week and I’m so obsessed ! I did a bit of research before deciding which fujifilm instax camera to buy and decided on this one because of the fun and extra modes this one has and because it has a rechageble battery I’m so happy with this camera and having so much learning how to use it at full capacity Highly recommend ! ***purchased the clear case separately , also on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: A Fun, Easy Camera
customer_reviews.text: I finally got a chance to try this out about a week after purchase. There are a lot of things to like beyond the obvious instant photo: -It's lightweight -The battery charged fast out of the box -The menu/settings are easy to determine, even if the manuals are a nightmare/mess I went to my state fair and with blue skies and sunlight galore, I got great shots of roller coasters/rides, games, etc.. It performed great and was very responsive. I foresee using this for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Cipher Art

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, I'm still learning a bit though. It's most colorful outside, whereas the indoor pictures look much more like a vintage instagram filter. I recommend getting the 3-pack of film so you don't feel like you're gonna run out too fast. Plan on your first set of pics being "test" ones
customer_reviews.author: LiMet

customer_reviews.title: It is cool you are cool get it
customer_reviews.text: If you do not mind paying 50¢ a photo this is a fun camera. Not all your pictures will come out and they are awkward to store when you take a bunch of them, but it is fun. You get one chance to capture a memory and then it is gone. You have the photo or you don’t to remind you about it. You can write on the border of the photo and they make fun little gifts when you are with friends or family. I love mine and was debating about whether to get it or not I am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: xlalilamx

customer_reviews.title: Awesome/ cutest Instant camera out there
customer_reviews.text: Works great outdoors. Love it so much. Get so many compliments on it. The pictures are so adorable and clear ( when in good lighting ) I love taking it on special trips and then I have a collage on my fridge of all the tiny pictures with big memories. It’s a great gift to get someone
customer_reviews.author: diane rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Great Nifty Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This Camera just added to another level to my vacation in California. It fees real good have some of my photographic memories physically manifested into these little beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Gerson

customer_reviews.title: Great great great
customer_reviews.text: Love this one over the other instax cameras. The self timer is awesome (10 secs) and the self timer + shoot 2 pics is even cooler. Took it on a recent road trip and it made the most valuable things we have in life - memories.
customer_reviews.author: Greg T.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes pictures like the classic polaroids that we have outgrown but feel nostalgic for. Fuji film has thrown a modern twist on this camera by adding many features that add to the ease of use to the camera and the type of photos you can take. The only thing I don’t like is that it can take a few tries depending on the lighting to get the perfect picture. Besides the learning curve this camera is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nate J Shafou

customer_reviews.title: Retro!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Brown because I figured, why not! This little camera is a hoot- people get such a kick out of watching a picture pop out! Kids love it too. This gives you that unmistakable retro look in the photo, very fun and has enough options to keep you happy in any setting. Comes with a battery, charger, strap and of course the camera. I recommend buying film on Amazon as it's more pricey elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Scout

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price of admission!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the product- it works as advertised. Yes, I wish the pics were a teeny bit larger. Yes, I wish the viewfinder was better aligned with the lens. And yes, I wish the results were a bit more consistent... but I'm hopeful I'll learn the tricks of the trade and my shots will improve. BUT,... overall it's a barrel of fun to leave the camera out at a gathering and watch folks gawk over the pics they take as they develop. Well worth the price of admission!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Weisser

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera, instructions a little challenging.
customer_reviews.text: Gave to daughter as a gift. Put the film in backwards at first. (The directions are in many different languages and a little hard to follow. Some of the directions are in pictures.) That being said, we figured out the problem, put the film in correctly (it wasn't ruined) and started taking photos right away. My daughter was very pleased with the camera and photos. The photos are mini (business size).
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this camera for road trips and I honestly love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for road trips and I honestly love it! It's easier to carry around and snap pictures and I love the vintage style of the pictures. With this being said... the film is a bit pricey but I think it's worth it. I do try to save on film though so I really use it for special occasions, but regardless it's a great camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: The whole series comes with manufacturing defects
customer_reviews.text: The self timer button does not work, I returned the camera, got a new one and still the same problem, that’s ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera
customer_reviews.text: Three stars on use because the film door keeps popping open and then I end up losing a film. I see people saying they get an E in the display and are unable to use it. Same happened to me but I popped the batteries out and put them back in. Worked just as new!
customer_reviews.author: lorraine wright

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera !!! I don’t have anything negative that I could possibly think of it. It takes pictures exactly as I expected it to do, the coloration and quality of them is perfect and it functions well. I love the design and how well it handles. The strap that comes with it is not a good quality and feels very cheap, but I immediately took it right off so it didn’t matter to me, but if you need it, I’d look for something better. As far as the camera though, it’s absolutely perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun experience!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to do some experiments by taking a few pictures with different settings; to figure out when to use flash/brightness/darkness functions; while taking it indoor with minimal lights, outdoor at night at the backyard, etc. After that super easy to figure it out. Quite surprising when took pictures at the backyard at night, it only needed a single flash without an L (for more brightness), it was perfect and not too bright nor too dark. Very unique experience and fun! Glad with rechargeable battery. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Candybubble

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini instant film camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my son, and he really loves it. It's a great little camera and super fun with the instant polaroid film. I had the original camera when I was a little girl and the photos are similar although half the size (mini). It's a fun little camera to play around with. If this is the type of camera you are wanting, then this one does the job well. If you aren't familiar with the polaroid mini film then you may want to double check the dimensions. The film is quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2jjr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Camera started showing E in number section. Only has it for 2 months. Making a new review because I bought a second one and it seems to be working okay... when I can use it. The charger does not work!! I even sent it back and they sent me a whole different one the chargers still don’t work. So that’s why I am giving three stars pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: VFaythe

customer_reviews.title: So Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love all instant cameras. I have so many. This is the first time I've tried this camera and I LOVE it. The images have just a touch of that vintage look without loosing the picture. I have the lower version of this camera and have no Idea why I didn't just get this one. I tried far away pics, med pics, different lighting and they all came out great. I read the reviews before purchasing this and knew that in macro mode the view finder would be off and it was. I don't mind that though. I will be taking this camera with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: JPL

customer_reviews.title: love the retro look
customer_reviews.text: With its retro look and size it's the perfect fit for what I wanted. I love all the available options but just using it with flash alone when it's too dark (you will have to experiment to get to know it's exposure) or without flash when it's bright enough works just fine. Remembering it's a "Polaroid" I love the vintage looks it delivers, never expecting "great" quality, the vintage outcome, to me, is the great quality. Overall, I would definitely recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: So amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: So amazing!!! And I love the surprise of not knowing if it came out good till a few seconds later the suspense is so fun for everyone to huddle around to check haha and it's the best way to get a good picture of my baby! He actually poses for this camera! Just absolutely fun and perfect and now I don't have to worry about something happening to computers and phones and the internet cuz I will always have my wallet sized memories as well (: love love love it thank you so much for creating this camera (: my only wish is for the photos to be cheaper one day haha (: plus it's really beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Kenton88

customer_reviews.title: Blinking display = nonfunctioning camera :/
customer_reviews.text: Well I loved it the first time I used it but then it started doing this thing where the display showing the # of polaroids left kept blinking and no matter what I did to troubleshoot the issue, the camera just stopped functioning. I didn’t drop it, didn’t spill on it, or anything like that. The film was brand new, the battery was charged, and there was no reason for it to have stopped working the very first time using it. Unfortunately, I think I’ve waited too long to post about this but I just wanted to warn others of this blinking display issue where the camera just stops working without cause. Very disappointing considering what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product, disappointed in repurchase
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost I’d like to note my extreme dissatisfaction with my repurchase of this product. I had this same camera for 2+ year before I got the ‘E’ of death. This time I received it the first time I used the camera. No troubleshooting worked. The only reason I’m giving 3 stars is because I lucked out with my initial camera and loved it. I was wary of repurchasing it as it is clear there is a design/manufacturing issue that has not been addressed; rather continued production of a faulty product. Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Juli Naples

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a wedding photo booth or to give your kids to play around with
customer_reviews.text: There are some good and some bad reviews on here. This is so perfect and I already love it. I got this for my photo booth for my wedding and bought a bunch of film. While yes there are some errors, like there is a white spot in one of the pictures they are so cute and easy and actually focus themselves well to the point that really everyone looks good in the pictures. I am so happy with this tiny little camera and couldn't be more happy with the results
customer_reviews.author: Becky C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra price!
customer_reviews.text: After way too many hours of agonizing research, I decided to purchase this camera. I can say long story short, I'm impressed with the quality, ease of use and features that it offers. It does a great job taking photos of our dogs and also is really nice because it has a timer feature!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome novelty camera
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun and stylish novelty camera. I originally got the Polaroid Snap and was really disappointed in the quality so I returned it and ordered this camera. I am so glad I did. The prints are great quality and the camera feels good in your hands. It's easy to use which we are thankful for since we want guests to use it at our upcoming wedding! Just a heads up: Film is obviously expensive - about $1 per frame in stores, you can get it a little cheaper online. The camera's manual is not in English, but I hear you can find the english version online.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: I cannot love my instax 90 more than I already do
customer_reviews.text: I cannot love my instax 90 more than I already do. It's perfect in every way and fun to play around with. Much more customizable than the standard instax and with the extra cash if you want some fun with your point and shoot. The ability to turn the flash off alone is worth it but the extra camera modes really make all the difference in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my wife in 2019. This camera is AWESOME! totally worth the money and she loved it. The pictures come out great and have that nice vintage look that we love from polaroid camera. Has held up all this time so far. very pleased. Definitely reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my birthday and It's really fun to take photos with. The only problem I've had was when I first tried to use the camera it wouldn't work but after contacting amazon customer support they immediately sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Supernova

customer_reviews.title: Best instant camera I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I love this fella, I only wish it came in the traditional square format rather than the 2x3, and that it came with a memory card so you could have more copies of your photos. Don't expect to get super sharp images with this, since it is fixed-focus. But analog film is magic regardless. Super fun, great value.
customer_reviews.author: wardrobewalker

customer_reviews.title: Fun. Everyone loves the result.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun. Everyone loves seeing these little photos. Snapshots are a lot more appealing on film than bright digital screens. The film is too expensive to use for EVERYTHING but it's fun for family outings and special events. It's bigger than I imagined it. I had hoped it would fit in my hip pocket. Not even close. It would fit in a jacket pocket. I usually carry it over my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: jk13

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use!
customer_reviews.text: It broke on the weekend we got it. Barely 3 pictures out of it before the feeding mechanism had problems. Poor durability of design. Waisted the rest of the pack of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The camera works for a few photos in beginning but then when click to take picture the photos didnt come out. After 3-4 times attempting, only 1 came out and it wasn’t exactly the shot I were expecting. Wasted of money!
customer_reviews.author: Mia Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Not best for a sunny day
customer_reviews.text: Took this to a music festival (Coachella) and made some great friends and pictures with it. Though it looks better than the original one everyone has, the pictures come out darker and the settings don't work as well as they should. Still a great investment but no one has the film to sit there all day and experiment. Not too great for a sunny day
customer_reviews.author: Apickyfellow

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera! I take it everywhere and always get compliments. I know a lot of the cheaper ones glitch or fail to print, but I have never had an issue with this one - it's been three years! The special features the camera has -- picture in a picture, self-timing mode, and show shutter speed all work like a charm. I have the cutest photo a shot I did downtown in a major city at night. One of my all-time favorites! Well worth the investment. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: @yanabonna

customer_reviews.title: Super fun, easy to use. You can turn the flash off.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and portability. Photo quality is good when you get it right. Photos are always fun and interesting. This model is better than the others because it gives you the option to turn the flash off and more shooting modes. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased this camera, and have really enjoyed it so far! The camera works just fine, does not seem damaged in any way, and I have not had any trouble from it. The pictures have turned out great, and have the nostalgic look from the older polaroid cameras. The only warning I give to possible buyers (and this is NOT this camera's fault!) is that if you take a lot of photos, be ready to spend a bit of money on film. The camera does not come with any film, and the battery may need to be charged. Other than this, I have really enjoyed this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera!! Camera was a gift to my niece, she loved it even said it look pretty good and smaller than the other brands, and it does look good and feels good in your hands A girl in a restaurant said the same, and was asking us from where we got it, she was thinking on buying one of the other brands, but now she wanted the same Really nice camera
customer_reviews.author: chachalaco

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get a battery charger for US outlet
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed that the battery charger is not for US standard wall outlets, I didn't see anywhere in the listing that indicated that it would be that way. The item shipped incredibly fast and was in great condition otherwise, but I'm probably going to return it if I can't figure out how to get the charging adapter replaced
customer_reviews.author: Tamsyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting this item for a few months and decided to wait to buy it since I know it can be tricky to get the lighting right and the pictures are expensive. the camera was definitely worth the price, it doesn't have a cheap feel to it and I can almost forget its an instant camera. It was a tough decision between the cute $50 one everyone buys since how often would I really use it but im glad I went with this option. quality is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan P.

customer_reviews.title: Love the nostalgic photos!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after having some friends take a few shots of us and send them our way. Definitely great to have only one, physical copy of a photo in a world where we take 10 pictures of the same thing on our cell phones and digital cameras. Very easy to use, seems well put together and with current prices of film, about 50 cents per photo.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: ... Instax Mini to the new 90 Neo and I love it! This camera is great and a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched from the old Instax Mini to the new 90 Neo and I love it! This camera is great and a lot of fun. I love that the battery is rechargeable and the camera comes with a lot of different settings. The coolest one is double exposure! Something the old Mini didn't have.
customer_reviews.author: Monica C

customer_reviews.title: Retro masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: Fun little camera with a great retro look. Got it for my fiance as a birthday gift and she adores it. She mostly uses it to take pictures of the family and animals, but she's done some landscape stuff with it too. It has a surprising number of modes that significantly impact the photo being taken. Obviously the camera has some limitations, but that's just part of it's nature as an instant print camera. There's something magical about snapping a pic and getting an instant photo you can put in an album.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin Shemory

customer_reviews.title: The dreaded 'E' message
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried to use this camera, it wouldn't load film at all and it gave me an 'E' message on the little display on the back. I sent it in to the company for repairs and got back a camera that loaded a film pack, but still shows the 'E' message, and still won't take pictures. Really wanted this camera to work!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel R. Downs

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift hit!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an instant camera for my wife as a birthday gift and came across this. It has some built in camera features along with a rechargeable battery. I was impressed with the features since I didn't really expect any and the rechargeable battery is extremely helpful. Plus, it has an old school look to it. My wife was using it at dinner and it was a big hit with her friends - so much so that her friend bought one using the Amazon app before we even finished dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Boulter

customer_reviews.title: 'E' error!
customer_reviews.text: How unfortunate to receive a new item that instantly gives me an 'e' error! I bought this for a bachelorette party and when trying it out, it wouldn't do anything other than flash the 'e.' I tried the charging battery all the way, trying a new film , and rebooting it and nothing. Returned it ASAP, waiting for the refund, and bought an Instax mini 9 from Michael's instead that worked amazing! I'd have to say, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: La Rosa Concha

customer_reviews.title: Read the Instructions and It will be easy!
customer_reviews.text: This has a lot of features that are not self explanitory, but if you read the instructions you will figure them out pretty quickly. I wanted an instant film camera that was a little better than the colored ones, and this is definitely it! It looks so vintage and beautiful I am going to set it up on a table with the mini album I got as well for people to look through. If you're thinking about getting this, it's definitely worth it. Just be sure to get the film as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

product_meta.title: Fujifilm Instax Mini 90 Instant Film Camera (Brown)
product_meta.description: Color:Brown| Style:Camera OnlyThe Instax Mini 90 Neo Classic combines a premium build quality with a stylish, retro camera design that offers a full range of camera functions. Featuring a variety of new shooting modes, the Instax Mini 90 now includes double exposure and macro modes for users who want to express their photographic creativity with beautiful image quality.
feature_bullets: Automatically detects the brightness of the surrounding and adjusts the amount of flash and shutter speed to optimize photo quality; Lens: f=60 millimeter, F=12.7
Double exposure mode 2 images are produced on 1 film sheet by pressing the shutter twice, Automatic film feeding out
Bulb mode the shutter remains open while the shutter button is depressed (10 seconds maximum) and a light trail can be photographed
Macro mode short distance photography as close as 30 - 60 centimeter; Film size: 86 millimeter x 54 millimeter; Picture size: 62 millimeter x 46 millimeter
Kids mode suitable for photographing kids, pets and other fast moving subjects due to a fast shutter speed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,685 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
